name: Yushee Egg Delivery Service
description:
In Yushee Egg Delivery Service (YEDS) you play AS the Official Yushee Egg Delivery Service Vehicle (OYEDSV). Reunite Mama Yushee with her lost eggs while making sure not to lose them all yourself! Drive around pleasant, cel-shaded environments and listen to VERY good music while doing so.

This game was made in 48 hours as a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together."

Controls:

Move: WASD
Shoot: Space
Reset: R
Break: Left Shift

A Game by:

Davis Canby
Oliver Gallina
Houston Fuller
Vincent Levy

Thank you to these kind people who let us use their assets!

InScope Studios https://inscope.itch.io/turret quaternius https://quaternius.com/packs/cars.html quaternius https://quaternius.com/packs/ultimatefood.html Freddy Drabble (https://skfb.ly/6X6Hn) Amazing Inc https://amazing-inc.itch.io/blocky-chicen-crossy-road-3d-model Little Robot Sound Factory, www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effects-library Blender Foundation https://opengameart.org/content/positive-item-pickup-yo-frankie
